params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data   _data should be encoded as ((bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g, bytes data))   i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array

Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data   _data should be encoded as ((bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g, bytes data))   i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas is reimbursed to executor or not

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._data: Encodes signature and gas payment receipt   _data should be encoded as ((bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g))   i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas will be reimbursed or not, with vlid signature
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators
params._owner: Address that wants to set operator status  _spender

metaSafeBatchTransferFrom(address,addres.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer multiple types of tokens on the bahalf of _from

metaSafeTransferFrom(address,address,uin.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer _amount amount of a token _id on the bahalf of _from

metaSetApprovalForAll(address,address,bo.notice: Approve the passed address to spend on behalf of _from if valid signature is provided
